column5: The emerald shiners are really starting to stack up at the river mouths of Simcoe and the big perch are right behind them.  There are literally 1000's of perch schooled up in the 22 to 35ft range and Jigging Raps and small spoons along with drop shotting Pan Slammers have been the ticket to good catches!Get out there and enjoy the family fun.Be safe and good Fishing!
Wow, those are some big ones!   I should probably get the oldman down there for a bit of fun!   Appreciate the heads up Greg.
Its that time of year already eh!
It's that time I guess?,good catch,trying one more time this Sat myself.
Awesome Greg !!!! Big perch man !!!! Wow ....
Geeze those are some damm big perch man. I've only caught big ones like that thru the ice. Nice job and yum yum!!
Nice haul my man. I haven't been up there for years, would Atherly be a good spot?
~~~Now if there was only a Perch Derby, Great looken Perch bud

Perchasaurus! Just curious as I have not targeted them this time of year... The fish in your pics have pretty big bellies, are they already starting to form egg sacks or is that just a perch with a boiler?  Thanks,   HH
